      • score

        private final double score(double wdf,
           double normDocumentLength,
           double df,
           double wqf)
        Uses BM25 to compute a weight for a term in a document.
        Parameters:
        wdf - The term frequency in the document
        normDocumentLength - the normalized document's length
        df - The document frequency of the term
        wqf - the term frequency in the query
        Returns:
        the score assigned by the weighting model BM25.
